text:
With 1.7b3, if you add a View Results TREE listener to a thread group, run a
test, then click on the listener, my processor spins to 100% utilization and the
app locks up. (JDK1.4)

Others have seen a stream of exceptions being thrown when they perform the same
steps. (JDK1.3, I believe)
creator: jim@boutcher.com

text: Fixed, will be updated this evening (2/20/02)
creator: mstover1@apache.org
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
